headline: Aqua Security and Akamai Forge Strategic Partnership to Secure AI in the Enterprise
summary: Integrated solution delivers AI defense and prompt validation without code changesBOSTON, July 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aqua Security, the pioneer in cloud native security, today announced a strategic partnership with Akamai Technologies, the global leader in edge and application security, to deliver an integrated solution that provides full-spectrum protection for AI applications from the AI workload to the edge. headline: Extortion Evolves: Akamai SOTI Report Examines the Increasing Complexity of Ransomware Attacks
summary: Akamai Technologies (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online, has found that threat actors are using a new quadruple extortion tactic in ransomware campaigns, while double extortion remains the most common approach.

content.title: Extortion Evolves: Akamai SOTI Report Examines the Increasing Complexity of Ransomware Attacks
